name: Unleash the Peasant
description:
Unleash the Peasant is a little JRPG made for the Epitech Jam 2022

Play as a ugly disliked peasant, get in touch with awesome NPCs and fight a lot of monsters including a terrible Gorilla that awaits you. Use the power of the success and the shifumi to rise up to a freaking awesome Paladin and kick that gorilla ass once for all.
But, will you beat him ?

Controls :

- X / Enter to validate / A on Xbox Controller

- C / Backspace to return/ A on Xbox Controller

- E to open the menu in exploration / Start on Xbox Controller

- H to heal / X on Xbox Controller

- Arrow keys / DPAD or Joystick to move

Made by :

- Mattis Dalleau (aka Helife)

- Raphaël Turpin (aka Agakitsune)

- Guillyann Ferrere

- Lucas Gangnant (aka Zeustigyen)

- Denis Maillot (aka D3nX)
